title: Roger Corman Double Feature 1957
description:
ATTACK OF THE CRAB MONSTERS and NOT OF THIS EARTH
Directed by Roger Corman
Screenplays by Charles B. Griffith

A genuine Allied Artists double feature from 1957

Shout! Factory DVD, 2011

MPEG-4 Nero Digital AVC
Widescreen format
HE-AAC Audio

Each film has TWO audio tracks. The first, primary track is the film's original audio track.  The second track is a running commentary provided by the Brunas brothers and Tom Weaver (authors of Universal Horrors).

Be careful if you play these films in Windows Media Player because that media player seems unable to select one or the other audio track -- it plays both at once! Remember I warned you about this --

VLC Media Player and Nero Show Time both play these files properly, so you can choose which audio track you wish to hear.
